name: Illuminauta
description:
Welcome To Illuminauta!

a story where you go into the bottom of the Bermuda Triangle to find the Illuminati, have enjoy multiple with your captain,  CCRJPLC LJWWP (otherwise known as kevin) and actually (maybe) find the Illuminati's base!
Gapbro & Did I Stutter Hope you enjoy!

*sidenote there is a bug where if you finish the game it will loop back to the start, unfortunately we ran out of time before we could fix that-- so please stop playing when you hear "this is your captain" for the second time. Apologies again.
